keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text:
I knew it was nearby. That... creature.

I hid in the vents, hoping that it would pass me by. I found a small nook, just a bit off of the main vent passage, and hide there. I could hear it moving. Then i hear the vent entrance open.

It was in there with me.

I prayed to whatever being might listen. To God. To Buddah. To C'thulu, on the off chance it might summon the beast back to wherever it had been summoned from.

I see it move up to the entrance to my little haven... and then past me. I hear the vent door on the far end open. I guess one of those beings must have heard me.

I move out into the main vent area...

And learn which deity responded to my pleas. There it was, waiting for me. It tricked me.

Dang it, C'thulu.

keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text: You are hiding in a locker. You hear the alien lurking around. You have to get down a hallway. Suddenly it moves away. you take a deep breath and exit the locker. You run ten feet and dive under a desk. You wait a minute. Coast seems clear. You slowly creep out from under the desk. THE AILEN DROPS OUT OF THE CEILING RIGHT IN FRONT OF YOU AND YOU DIVE BACK UNDER THE DESK ONLY A SPLIT SECOND BEFORE IT TURNS AROUND. It stalks around the room with heavy foot falls. Your heart is pounding. You creep back out. Look around. It is gone. You creep to the door. You open it. Nothing there. the hallway is clear. You move down the hall. There is nothing in the hall you can hide in. Oh no you went the wrong way. You turn around and the alien drops down several yards away. NO WHERE TO HIDE! You prey it doesn't turn around. If it turns it will see you. If it sees you it will kill you...buy the game to find out what happens next.

keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text:
- Be me
- I am ready
- Starts Alien Isolation
- Begins at last save station 
- Area is on lockdown and enemies searching
- Heart is calm 70 bpm
- Gets through like a charm
- Alarm is still on in next section
- Sees vent that leads halfway through to objective
- Go's in (it-s dark)
- Hear something on motion tracker
- Equip motion tracker
- See green dot approaching
- Flash light on
- Nothing in the vent
- Dot 1 mm from my location
- Quit

Would quit again

keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text:
I was hiding from the alien and trying to get a door unlocked. I'd already got the code from the terminal so now it was just a matter of getting the code to the door. I managed to make my way to the door without being spotted by the alien, however like an idiot i forgot the door code.

I thought to myself "No problem, it's not too far to the terminal and it was easy enough getting here" so i made my way back to the terminal. I got to the terminal intact and got the code and began repeating it in my head over and over again... "1702, 1702" i kept saying. I looked round the corner and the alien was snooping around the path i'd came from, so to get back to the door i had to take the longer route.

I slowly made my way round, crouching near a wall. There was a window looking into a room so i decided to peak in to check on the alien. It was just standing there looking around so i made my way towards a table to hide under until the alien moved away from that room...
I got next to the table and was about ready to crawl under it when the alien suddenly came running round the corner and killed me.

Pants were filled.

10/10 Great game to show your nan.

keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text:
Run=Death
Motion Tracker = 60% Death
Firing a gun = Death
Not Crouching= Death
Hiding in lockers = 55% death
Trying to "hide" in an open area  = Death
Running away when spotted = Death
Taking on Hostile Humans & Androids = Death
"Taking on the alien" = INSTANT DEATH

10/10

keywords: alien, go, make, find, time, see, thing, way, hide, kill
text:
Imagine you're walking down a dark corridor
You start hearing sounds in the vents
Now it's loud and right above you
You panic
Your whole body is telling you to get out of there, to run-
As soon as you do it, you hear a vent break right behind you
Not knowing what to do you look back
You see the alien crawl out of the vent and look straight at you
There's nowhere else to run now.

text:
Highly recommended

• Thrilling, intense gameplay
• Authentic Alien movie atmosphere, the Sevastopol is an incredible setting
• Immersive survival horror
• Challenging AI enemies, the working Joe’s are scarier than the Alien.
• Stunning graphics and sound design
• Engaging story and characters
• Heart-pounding suspense
• Tense stealth mechanics
• Atmospheric level design
• Memorable, fear-inducing encounters.
